tao_idl.exe -o orig -Gp -Gd -Gv -Wb,export_macro=TAO_Export -Wb,export_include=corbafwd.h -Wb,pre_include="ace/pre.h" -Wb,post_include="ace/post.h" Messaging_SyncScope.pidl
